title: Rando[m] ConverZations: Joey and Luke
description:
Listen along as Joey and Luke wonder aloud about "Stopping the Universal Modern Tyrants"

Join the ConverZation here:
https://discord.gg/j8ps92H

Check out Paul Vanderklay's channel here:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGsD...
